subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Question for all "Frank's ghostbox" owners
author: RetroCom
full_text:
----__Part.20070709174342.9996F6C6
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"


Not using a formal box, manual linear FM sweep with an optical interface to the recorder. These from last night.

"We're coming back...Testing"

"Playing poetry, Their poetry stinks"

"Switching fre..quen..cy"

"The five cylinder is legal"

Dave
 

--- franks-boxes@... wrote:

From: "Frank Sumption" <franks-boxes@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Question for all "Frank's ghostbox" owners
Date: Mon, 09 Jul 2007 09:24:18 -0600

Other than getting some names mentioned, it would be interesting to hear 
what else others get. It should be much more than simple one worders, and if 
the box is functioning/used correctly, the mesaages should be whole 
sentences. Granted that there is a learning period of how to listen/hear.

I'm gettign stuff about the world wide meditation on the 17th of this month, 
they are saying that it "heals it", and that it "stops the mountain", the 
mountain being the humungus asteroid that hits the planet in 2012. These 
statements are very mixed in with the box audio, and if no one hears the 
stuff that's pretty much in the clear, the chance of anyone hearing this 
stuff is zero.


Frank-S

_________________________________________________________________
http://newlivehotmail.com
